summary: An alien civilization is invaded by Astronaut Chuck Baker, who believes that the planet was uninhabited. Wanted by the military, Baker must get back to his ship before it goes into orbit without him.
cast: Dwayne Johnson|Jessica Biel|Justin Long|Gary Oldman|Seann William Scott|John Cleese|Freddie Benedict|Alan Marriott|Mathew Horne|James Corden|Lewis Macleod|Emma Tate|Rupert Degas|Pete Atkin|Rebecca Front|Laurence Bouvard|Vincent Marzello|Brian Bowles
keywords: outer space|hovercar|2000s|reference to strange tales|reference to marvel comics
director: Directors: Jorge Blanco, Javier Abad (co-director) | 1 more credit »
title: Planet 51
